name: Haven Traveler
description:
Haven Traveler is a 2D platform game in which the player character must navigate a post-global warming landscape, push objects, jump over crevices, and climb walls in order to reach its safe haven, or end goal. The game focuses on themes of global warming and environmental preservation as the player makes their way through three unique landscapes. 

Credits

Level Design by Caroline Millet

Base Code by Michael Baker

Simple Sky Pixel Backgrounds by Cania

Simple Bird Sprite by HiroRedBird

Pixel Tiles for Side Scroller by sum studio
